tool.name: Get summary statistics
tool.help:
This tool generates a summary of a FCS file as well as the list of markers in the file.
-----
**Input files**
This tool takes valid FCS files as input.
**Output files**
A summary listing the number of events and parameters, statistics for each and a list of markers is generated.
-----
**Example**
*Output*::
events parameters 20000 6
========================= == FCS SUMMARY == ========================= FSC-H SSC-H FL1-H FL2-H FL3-H FL4-H Min. 261 23 0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0 1st Qu. 371 120 129.0 153.0 257.0 252.0 Median 432 196 206.0 237.0 432.0 331.0 Mean 512 476 284.8 236.7 433.2 372.3 3rd Qu. 657 1023 499.0 297.0 628.0 510.0 Max. 1023 1023 729.0 925.0 1023.0 1023.0
